name: Reverse Marbles
description:
Instructions

The goal of Reverse Marbles is to keep your golden marbles inside the center circle. Enemy marbles will fling themselves at the golden marbles to knock them out of the circle. To keep that from happening, click and drag the blue shield around using the mouse to intercept the enemy marbles. If the timer reaches zero, you win! However, if all the golden marbles are knocked out of the center circle, you lose.

Shield
Golden Marble
Standard Enemy
Wobbly Enemy
Bouncy Enemy
Feedback

We'd love to hear what you think about the prototype! After you finish playing it, please leave a comment below and tell us what you liked and didn't like.
